question: How do you choose the correct paint color to mark your queen bee?
option1: Apiarists have designated colors for identify the years that queens were born. Mark your queen in the year she was born. Years ending in 1 or 6 are signified by white paint. Years ending in 2 or 7 are signified by yellow paint. Years ending in 3 or 8 are signified by red paint. Years ending in 4 or 9 are signified by green paint. Years ending in 5 or 0 are signified by blue paint. Choose the color that signifies the year she was born in.
option2: Apiarists have designated colors for identify the years that queens were born. Mark your queen in the year after she was born. Years ending in 1 or 6 are signified by white paint. Years ending in 2 or 7 are signified by yellow paint. Years ending in 3 or 8 are signified by red paint. Years ending in 4 or 9 are signified by green paint. Years ending in 5 or 0 are signified by blue paint. Choose the color that signifies the year she was born in.

question: How can you mount a new sprocket on a bicycle and what tools do you use?
option1: locate sprocket on axle hub, cut the rubber isolator to the center,  compress the chain sprocket to the spokes, Remove the cover plate from left rear side of engine of the kit, then you must remove the narrow drive sprocket from the engine and install a wider tooth drive sprocket obtained from your dealer to match the 415 chain. Use spark-plug and wrench to turn engine crankshaft sprocket to feed chain around it, fit chain, reconnect the masterlink, adjust the chain, and install the chain guard.

question: How to make Chocolate Bacon Fantasy fudge at home.
option1: Mix 3 cups granulated sugar,  3/4 cup margarine, and  2/3 cup evaporated milk in a large, heavy saucepan over medium heat, stirring to dissolve sugar. Bring mixture to a full boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly.  Remove from heat and stir in 12 ounce semi sweet chocolate chips until melted and thoroughly combined. Beat in 1 7 ounce jar of marshmallow creme, and  1/2 cup chopped fried Bacon.  Transfer fudge to Greased 8 x 13" pan and let cool before cutting into squares.
option2: Mix 3 cups granulated sugar,  3/4 cup margarine, and  2/3 cup evaporated milk in a large, heavy saucepan over medium heat, stirring to dissolve sugar. Bring mixture to a full boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly.  Remove from heat and stir in 12 ounce semi sweet chocolate chips until melted and thoroughly combined. Beat in 1 7 ounce jar of marshmallow creme, and  1/2 cup chopped raw Bacon fat.  Transfer fudge to Greased 8 x 13" pan and let cool before cutting into squares.

question: How do you dissolve Skittles in vodka?
option1: Purchase a bottle of vodka and ⅛ of the vodka out of it. Drop 180 grams of only one color of Skittles into the bottle. Top off the bottle with the vodka previously removed until the bottle is full again. Screw the top tightly onto the bottle and shake vigorously for about a minute to begin the dissolving process. Allow the bottle to sit for approximately 24 hours so the Skittles dissolve completely.
option2: Purchase a bottle of vodka and ⅛ of the vodka out of it. Drop 180 grams of only one color of Skittles into the bottle. Top off the bottle with the vodka previously removed until the bottle is full again. Screw the top tightly onto thebottle and shake vigorously for about a minute to begin the dissolving process. Allow the bottle to sit for approximately 4 hours so the Skittles dissolve partially.

question: leek and potato soup
option1: 45 grams butter    4  leeks chopped    350 grams potatoes diced    1 litre chicken stock    Instructions    In a saucepan, melt half the butter over low heat. Add the leeks and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the potatoes and cook for 3 minutes.    Increase the heat to medium, pour in the stock and bring to boil. Reduce to a simmer, cover, and cook until the leeks and potatoes are tender, 35 to 40 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat and add the remaining butter in small pieces, stirring until it’s all incorporated.    Season with sea salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a blender and puree until smooth. Serve in warm bowls.
option2: 45 grams butter    4  leeks chopped    350 grams potatoes diced    1 litre chicken stock    Instructions    In a saucepan, melt half the butter over low heat. Add the leeks and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the potatoes and cook for 3 minutes.    Increase the heat to medium, pour in the stock and bring to boil. Reduce to a simmer, cover, and cook until the leeks and potatoes are tender, 35 to 40 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat and add the remaining butter in small pieces, stirring until it’s all incorporated.    Season with sea weed and pepper to taste. Transfer to a blender and puree until smooth. Serve in warm bowls.

question: How to make Chocolate Heath Bar Ice cream bars at home without an Ice cream freezer.
option1: In a medium mixing bowl combine 4 cups chilled whipping cream, 14 oz. can sweetened condensed milk, and 1 16 ounce can chocolate flavored syrup (Like Hershey's).  Beat with an electric mixer until soft Peaks form.  Fold in 3/4 cup Heath Candy Bars (coarsely chopped)  Transfer mixture to 8x8x2 inch baking pan.  Freeze about 8 hours until firm. Serve any time after 8 hours freeze.
option2: In a medium mixing bowl combine 4 cups chilled Lemon Juice, 14 oz. can sweetened condensed milk, and 1 16 ounce can chocolate flavored syrup (Like Hershey's).  Beat with an electric mixer until soft Peaks form.  Fold in 3/4 cup Heath Candy Bars (coarsely chopped)  Transfer mixture to 8x8x2 inch baking pan.  Freeze about 8 hours until firm. Serve any time after 8 hours freeze.

question: How do you make Almond Milk?
option1: Soak one cup of almonds – around 200g – in water for 8 to 12 hours, or overnight. Rinse the almonds and peel the skins off. Tip them into a blender, add 4 cups of water then blitz for a few minutes until smooth. Secure a muslin cloth over a bowl and pour the almond mixture over it. Bunch up the cloth and squeeze the milk out, leaving the pulp in the muslin.
option2: Soak one cup of almonds – around 200g – in water for 8 to 12 hours, or overnight. Rinse the almonds and peel the skins off. Tip them into a blender, add 1 cups of water then blitz for a few minutes until smooth. Secure a muslin cloth over a bowl and pour the almond mixture over it. Bunch up the cloth and squeeze the milk out, leaving the pulp in the muslin.

question: What are the steps to make fried marbles?
option1: Set oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit.        Line a bed sheet with some foil and arrange marbles on it.        After your oven has heated, place the bed sheet in the oven and bake. question: How do you remove whitewash from brick?
